caution.para: MERCON®, MERCON® V and MERCON® SP are not interchangeable transmission fluids.

item.para: Use of any fluid other than the recommended fluid may cause transmission damage.
The transmission fluid should be changed every 48,000 km (30,000 miles) regardless of normal or special operating conditions.

entry.para: ONLY MERCON® SP Automatic Transmission Fluid 2645005R1

item.para: The fluid capacities are approximate dry fill capacities and include the fluid coolers, fluid filter and fluid cooler tubes.
Fluid should be checked with the vehicle on a level surface and at normal operating temperature.

entry.para: b 207 kPa (30 psi) until MPH reaches 5 km/h (3 mph)
c Clutch Applied Through Manual Valve Position

note.para: Shift speeds listed, are nominal and will vary with calibration, model, axle ratio and tire size.
All shift speeds are for normal mode, not with tow/haul ON.
